events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates since it left the warehouse.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of no shipment progress.
A customer service agent has been assigned to investigate the delayed shipment and provide updates to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet. Let me help you check the status.
Could you please confirm your order number and the shipping address so I can look further into the delay?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and it was supposed to be delivered to 45 Elm Street, Boston, MA.
I checked with the shipping carrier, and it seems there was a delay due to bad weather. We expect your package to arrive within 3 more days.
Thanks for the update. I hope it arrives soon. Please keep me informed if there are further issues.
Your package has been delivered according to the carrierâ€™s confirmation. Please let us know if you have any further concerns.
Just checking in to ensure that your order arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we haven't heard back from you, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us anytime for future assistance.
